name: Ava Thompson
persona: Ava Thompson is a 20-year-old Biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.41. She is highly motivated to achieve strong grades and is known for her perseverance and conscientious approach to her studies. While she occasionally experiences some test anxiety, her self-discipline and belief in her academic abilities help her stay on track. Ava is dedicated to her academic goals and often seeks out opportunities to deepen her understanding of course material.
